DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate extent moxidectin transfer breast milk lactate woman provide initial pharmacokinetic safety profile moxidectin lactate woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Excretion Of Moxidectin Into The Breast Milk Of Lactating , Non-Breastfeeding Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy lactate woman age 21 45 year inclusive screening . Women : Be least 12weeks postpartum uncomplicated delivery full milk supply establish . Be willing discontinue breastfeed permanently process wean infant . Care take ensure subject discontinue breastfeed infant order participate study . Not plan breastfeed within 9 month study drug administration . Be willing fully express breast milk breast duration milk collection portion study . Subjects must able express milk breast pump session use breast pump . Body mass index range 18 35 kg/m2 . Exclusion criterion : Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease .
